author: Durk
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Social Credit cog! Use `[p]credit` to check your score.
name: SocialCredit
short: Track social credit scores based on behavior and interactions
description: A social credit system that tracks user scores based on message sentiment and social interactions like hugging. Integrates with MessageFilter for automatic scoring.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord user IDs, social credit scores, credit change history, and hug cooldown timestamps globally across all servers.
